text: Cristina Salvi (born 15 May 1970) is an Italian former professional tennis player. Born in Arezzo, Salvi reached a career high ranking of 161 playing the professional tour. Her best performance on the WTA Tour was a second round appearance at the 1992 Internazionali di Tennis San Marino. ==ITF finals== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; width:15%;" |- style="background:#addfad;" | $50,000 tournaments |- style="background:lightblue;" | $25,000 tournaments |- style="background:#f0f8ff;" | $10,000 tournaments |} ===Singles: 11 (5–6)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- !
